thread.title: BRIEF-Anevia H1 net loss widens to 4.4 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Anevia H1 net loss widens to 4.4 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Anevia H1 net loss widens to 4.4 mln euros
text:
Sept 30 Anevia SA :
* H1 operating loss 3.9 million euros ($4.36 million) versus loss of 0.7 million euros year ago
* H1 net loss 4.4 million euros versus loss of 0.7 million euros year ago
* H1 EBITDA loss 3.8 million euros versus loss of 0.6 million euros year ago Source text: bit.ly/1MGtn1Y
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8949 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
